alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula; Geauga; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 25 at 2:13PM EDT until March 25 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Trumbull County in northeastern Ohio... Geauga County in northeastern Ohio... Ashtabula County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 212 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Madison to near Chardon to near Twinsburg, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Ashtabula, Conneaut, Geneva, North Kingsville, Middlefield, Kinsman, North Bloomfield, Orwell, Burton, Andover, West Farmington, Bristolville, Parkman, Huntsburg, Claridon, Mecca, Austinburg, Montville, Kingsville and Hartsgrove. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
